EBSGFramework.SettingDef.label: Superclotting uses archite, not metabolic efficiency
No innate mechlink prereq on mechanitor genes
EBSGFramework.SettingDef.description: Prevents EBSG genes from requiring the innate mechlink gene. This can make it easy to create unbalanced xenotypes if you add negative mechanitor genes on a pawn without the mechlink gene.

EBSGFramework.SettingDef.label: No innate remotes prereq on mechanitor genes
EBSGFramework.SettingDef.description: Expands no innate mechlink to include the innate remote shielder and repairer genes. This makes it even easier to create unbalanced xenotypes if you add negative mechanitor genes on a pawn without the related innate gene.

EBSGFramework.SettingDef.label: Psychic Insulation removes Psychic Bond mood bonuses and penalties
Psychic Insulation removes the Psychic Bond opinion bonus
No innate psychic amplifier prereq on psychic genes
EBSGFramework.SettingDef.description: Prevents EBSG genes from requiring the innate psychic amplifier gene. This can make it easy to create unbalanced xenotypes if you add negative psychic genes on a pawn without the psychic amplifier gene.
